content: Yes, the large catalog of content available on streaming services is one of the biggest advantages over traditional TV. Streaming services have original programming, international shows, and classic movies that may not be readily available on traditional TV networks. This, coupled with the ability to watch missed or previously aired episodes, makes streaming services an invaluable resource for viewers looking for a wide variety of entertainment options. With so much content available, viewers don't have to worry about being restricted to the limited options offered by cable or satellite TV. They can explore different genres and discover new shows and movies that they wouldn't have otherwise known about. Overall, the abundance of content available on streaming services has revolutionized how audiences consume media, making it easier to access and share entertainment worldwide.
